name: Gravity (itch) (Galaxy Games)
description:
Gravity is a 2D Space Sim where you are able to build your own rockets to defy gravity and leave Earth's atmosphere to achieve objectives and return down to Earth safely.

Build and fly multiple variations of your space craft and determine the best way to achieve each objective or just fly around and have fun! This game is meant to be a super causal game that is great  for kids or anyone wanting to learn about orbital mechanics.

Installation:

  1. Download
  2. Unzip
  3. Play
  4. Have Fun!
